Key Match Events: Michael Siani hit a tiebreaking two-run single in the 12th inning
Willy Adames hit a two-out RBI double in the 11th
Post-Match Reflections: Paul Goldschmidt, who finished with three hits and three RBI, has a 10-game hitting streak
Miscellaneous Highlights: Jackson Chourio and Joey Ortiz connected for the NL Central-leading Brewers (81-58)
Nolan Arenado hit a sacrifice fly
Others: Steven Matz pitched 4 2/3 innings for the Cardinals in his first big league game since April 30
Patrick Murphy was ejected in the fourth by home plate umpire Lance Barrett for arguing balls and strikes
